motivational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
motivational.author: John Lennon

feelGood.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
feelGood.author: Dalai Lama

emotional.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
emotional.author: Helen Keller

calm.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
calm.author: Buddha
